info.title: Public Api v3
info.description: Build the best experience of digital signature through your own platform. Increase your conversion rates, leverage your data and reduce your costs with Yousign API.

ordered_signers.description: Enable an ordered workflow, each signer will be requested to sign in a sequential order

reminder_settings.description: Enable automatic reminders for pending signers.

email_custom_note.example: Please sign these documents as soon as possible.
email_custom_note.description: A custom note added to emails sent to signers.

expiration_date.description: Due date of the signature request (yyyy-mm-dd). Default to 6 month after the activation.

template_id.description: Create a signature request from an existing template. This parameter is not available in Sandbox.

external_id.description: Store a custom id that will be added to webhooks & appended to redirect urls.

branding_id.description: Use a specific branding to customize the signature experience.

custom_experience_id.description: Use a specific Custom Experience to customize the signature experience.

documents.description: You can directly attach orphan documents to the signature request.

signers.description: Can only be used if you add documents at the same time.

workspace_id.description: Scope the signature request to a specific workspace

post.summary: Add document to a signature request
post.description: Add document to a signature request

ordered_signers.description: Enable an ordered workflow, each signer will be requested to sign in a sequential order

email_custom_note.example: Please sign these documents as soon as possible.

expiration_date.description: Due date of the signature request (yyyy-mm-dd).

custom_experience_id.description: Use a specific Custom Experience to customize the signature experience.

workspace_id.description: Transfer the Signature Request into a given Workspace.

delete.description: Delete a signature request (in draft status)

requestBody.description: A list of Follower objects to be added to the signature request.

post.description: Create a new approver from scratch

oneOf.description: Create a new approver from scratch
Create a new approver from an existing user
Create a new approver from an existing contact
Create a new approver from an existing signer

requestBody.description: An Approver object to be added to the signature request.

oneOf.description: Create a new signer from scratch

phone_number.description: E.164 format. Becomes mandatory if `signature_authentication_mode` requires a phone number.

insert_after_id.description: Insert just after the position of the specified signer id

oneOf.description: Create a new signer from an existing user

user_id.description: Create signer from an existing user

insert_after_id.description: Insert just after the position of the specified signer id.

oneOf.description: Create a new signer from an existing contact

contact_id.description: Create signer from an existing contact

insert_after_id.description: Insert just after the position of the specified signer id.

get.description: List signers from a signature request

201.description: The signature request has been activated
The signature request has been canceled

insert_after_id.description: Insert just after the position of the specified document id

password.description: The password required to unlock the document if it is protected

post.description: Replace a document in a signature request

get.summary: Download a single Signature Request Document

201.description: The signature request has been reactivated

expiration_date.description: Due date of the signature request (yyyy-mm-dd). Default to 6 month after the activation.

endpoint.description: Https target URL of the webhook

auto_retry.description: If a Webhook request fails for any reason, Yousign will retry the request 8 times using a back-off mechanism after: 2, 6, 30, 60, 300, 1080, 1440, 2880 min

endpoint.description: Https target URL of the webhook

auto_retry.description: If a Webhook request fails for any reason, Yousign will retry the request 8 times using a back-off mechanism after: 2, 6, 30, 60, 300, 1080, 1440, 2880 min

200.description: Return an application/pdf or application/zip archive with all documents

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: Specify documents version to download, "completed" is only available when the signature request status is "done".

200.description: Return an application/pdf or application/zip archive with all audit trails
